attributes.action: stop rail services at lewes at 1600hrs on november 5th every year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the people of lewes request that public rail services should be stopped at 1600-1700 on november the 5th every year to control the celebrations to the local people of lewes  Most of the rouble caused is by people that do not understand the celebrations and come and dappen the nights celebrations

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
